pr_title: [HUDI-1062]Remove unnecessary maxEvent check and add some log in KafkaOffsetGen

timeline.message:
[HUDI-1062]Remove unnecessary maxEvent check and add some log in
KafkaOffsetGen

[HUDI-1062]Remove unnecessary maxEvent check and add some log in
KafkaOffsetGen

timeline.bodyText: Why do you remove this check statement? If the user sets the value of Config.MAX_EVENTS_FROM_KAFKA_SOURCE_PROP to Long.MAX_VALUE. How do you reset it to Config.maxEventsFromKafkaSource(5000000)?
timeline.author: yanghua

replies.bodyText:
Why do you remove this check statement? If the user sets the value of Config.MAX_EVENTS_FROM_KAFKA_SOURCE_PROP to Long.MAX_VALUE. How do you reset it to Config.maxEventsFromKafkaSource(5000000)?

detailed discuss is here: https://issues.apache.org/jira/projects/HUDI/issues/HUDI-340?filter=allissues
this check can not achieve its goal to set a limit to max events read from kafka in one batch, and this goal is not absolute，it is allowable to set a bigger num than Config.maxEventsFromKafkaSource as discussed above.
replies.author: wangxianghu

timeline.bodyText: why exactly does this test have to change? could you please clarify
timeline.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText:
why exactly does this test have to change? could you please clarify
hi @vinothchandar,  the value of maxEventsToReadFromKafka has changed in this commit, so the value of fetch1.getBatch().get().count() also changes in the test case.


there is an empty git file in this commit.. can you please remove this?
@vinothchandar I have removed this file.
replies.author: Trevor-zhang

replies.bodyText: Hi @Trevor-zhang Would please add a new test case to verify the sourceLimit less than the generated insert record's num?
replies.author: yanghua

replies.bodyText:
Hi @Trevor-zhang Would please add a new test case to verify the sourceLimit less than the generated insert record's num?
